Name: Don's Passion
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop out flesh and seeds into shaker. Add next 4 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Pour grenadine into centre of drink (should sink to bottom).
Review: Passion fruit and Galliano influence this Bacardi Cocktail style drink.
History: Created in 2008 by Symeon White at Avon Gorge Hotel, Bristol, UK.
